document.full_text: emmanuel mutai ran a course record at the london marathon in leading kenyans to the top three places sunday, and compatriot mary keitany captured the women's race in her first attempt at the distance.
document.title: mutai wins london marathon in course-record time
lines_and_colors: emmanuel mutai ran a course record at the london marathon in leading kenyans to the top three places sunday, and compatriot mary keitany captured the women's race in her first attempt at the distance.
